remarks:
A variant of the Axiom of Power Sets ~ ax-pow using subset notation. Problem in [BellMachover] p. 466.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2006.)

statement:
axpow2 $p |- E. y A. z ( z C_ x -> z e. y ) $.
$d x y z $.
